meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unnecessary or not needed.
meanings.sent1: The needlessnesses of the extra paperwork caused frustration among the employees.
meanings.sent2: The needlessnesses of the long meeting made everyone wish it would end sooner.
meanings.sent3: The needlessnesses of wearing a winter coat in the summer made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The needlessnesses of carrying an umbrella in a desert is like bringing sand to the beach.
meanings.sent5: The needlessnesses of buying a second toaster oven became clear when they realized they never used the first one.

meanings.definition: The act of lacking necessity or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The needlessnesses of his actions were evident in the lack of results.
meanings.sent2: The needlessnesses of the new rule caused confusion among the students.
meanings.sent3: The needlessnesses of putting a hat on a dog made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The needlessnesses of watering a plastic plant is like trying to fill a leaky bucket.
meanings.sent5: The needlessnesses of buying a backup generator in a city with no power outages seemed absurd.
